info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Stillwater and central Sweet Grass Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles south of Big Timber, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mc Leod, Nye and Greycliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for south central Montana.
